'''Primrose Gardner''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Primrose was a daughter and ninth child of [[Samwise Gamgee]] and [[Rose Cotton]], born in {{SR|1435}}.<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref> 3 351)

==Etymology==
''[[wikipedia:Primrose|Primrose]]'' refers to a whole variety of flowers.
